chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Praise ye the LORD. Sing unto the LORD a new song, and his praise in the congregation of saints.
items.plainText: Praise ye the LORD. Sing unto the LORD a new song, and his praise in the congregation of saints.

items.text: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
items.plainText: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.

items.text: Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.
items.plainText: Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.

items.text: For the LORD taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.
items.plainText: For the LORD taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.

items.text: Let the saints be joyful in glory: let them sing aloud upon their beds.
items.plainText: Let the saints be joyful in glory: let them sing aloud upon their beds.

items.text: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, and a twoedged sword in their hand;
items.plainText: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, and a twoedged sword in their hand;

items.text: To execute vengeance upon the heathen, and punishments upon the people;
items.plainText: To execute vengeance upon the heathen, and punishments upon the people;

items.text: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;
items.plainText: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;

items.text: To execute upon them the judgment written: this honour have all his saints. Praise ye the LORD.
items.plainText: To execute upon them the judgment written: this honour have all his saints. Praise ye the LORD.
